headline: Is Norton Neo’s Free AI Browser Strategy Altering The Investment Case For Gen Digital (GEN)?
summary: Gen Digital’s Norton brand recently made its AI-native browser, Norton Neo, available globally for free with no waitlist, aiming to deliver safer, smarter and more private everyday browsing through built-in cyber safety, ad blocking and phishing protection. By combining an AI assistant with configurable on-device memory and smart tab management, Norton Neo positions Gen Digital to blend cybersecurity and AI-driven productivity in a single consumer browser experience. Next, we’ll examine how...
